reviewText: This contains two programs, one is about rehabbing dogs that have been given up for hopeless for new careers and homes.  The other is about the people that came to the New Orleans and other areas after Katrina hit to help the lost and abandoned animals.  Many of these were badly neglected before being displaced by the storm.  This shows the struggles of the volunteers, the dangers, the joy when animals were saved or reunited with owners and the sadness when others did not make it.  It is a tear jerker but in a good way.
